lead_paragraph: DoubleLine Capital cofounder Jeffrey Gundlach told CNBC television on Tuesday he "may or may not" be a part of an ownership group to buy the Buffalo Bills National Football League team after the death of owner Ralph Wilson.

headline.main: Gundlach Says 'May or May Not' Be Part of Buffalo Bills Ownership Group: CNBC
headline.print_headline: Gundlach Says 'May or May Not' Be Part of Buffalo Bills Ownership Group: CNBC

snippet: DoubleLine Capital cofounder Jeffrey Gundlach told CNBC television on Tuesday he "may or may not" be a part of an ownership group to buy the Buffalo Bills National Football League team after the death of owner Ralph Wilson....
